title: Data
description: Load and manage the dataset for analysis

errors.noValidColumns: The file does not contain valid columns.
errors.mappingMissing: The mapped file still does not meet requirements. Missing columns:

warnings.verySmallDesc: This dataset has only {{rows}} rows. For reliable analysis results, it is recommended to have at least 100 reviews. With fewer than 50 rows, the quality of topic and category analysis will be significantly affected.
warnings.smallDesc: This dataset has {{rows}} rows. For optimal analysis results, it is recommended to have at least 100 reviews. Hierarchical topic analysis may have reduced quality with small datasets.

validation.title: Validation
validation.valid: Dataset valid and ready for analysis
